about_the_game:
The Persona® Strikers All-Out Attack Pack includes:

  • Boost Skills Pack
  • Basic Affinity Pack
  • Armor Pack
  • 10K Persona points
  • Enemy Debuff Skills Pack
  • Ally Buff SkillS Pack

content_descriptors.notes: Blood, partial nudity, sexual themes, strong language, violence

detailed_description:
The Persona® Strikers All-Out Attack Pack includes:

  • Boost Skills Pack
  • Basic Affinity Pack
  • Armor Pack
  • 10K Persona points
  • Enemy Debuff Skills Pack
  • Ally Buff SkillS Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 8.1, 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2GB) / AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10, 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 (2 GB) / AMD Radeon HD 7970 (3 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
